website_summaries.verdict: These lightweight orange cones get the job done and  won't take up a lot of room in your storage cabinet, but wind may pose a challenge.
pros: Set of 20 stackable cones with carrying strap that goes through the center
Designed to bend, rather than break
Returns to its original shape after it has been hit or stepped on
cons: These cones are lightweight and may blow around on windy days

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what I needed. I use them for practicing maneuvers on my motorcycle but you could use them for just about anything. Autocross, soccer practice, etc. The carrying strap holds them all together very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: KatherineS

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Best buy for the money, I think they are well made. I used the for running drills for my travel softball team. They're rugged, and withstood the abuse during our season. The look brand new. I would recommend these and I'll probably purchase more for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Morgan

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Flimsy: Breezy Weather Blows Them Around
customer_reviews.text: After using this set of 12 cone markers for about a week, I'm relatively satisfied. But I've discovered one flaw: They are very light and flimsy and get blown around during breezy conditions. That problem is fixable if I stack two of them together, but then I only have 6 cones instead of 12. When it isn't breezy, the cones work fine. Still, Im a bit surprised that, given the price, they aren't slightly higher quality -- or at least come with more than 12.
customer_reviews.author: JKI

customer_reviews.title: Great for scent training!
customer_reviews.text: Well made low rubber smell and fantastic price for so many. The hand strap is very helpful and it is fantastic for sceb training my pups it this hot weather!!!! Just pop in the dishwasher first if you're training.
customer_reviews.author: Obviously Human!

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors, durable
customer_reviews.text: Had these disc cones for about a month, 1 hour use 2x a week for U8 soccer field border, nice intense orange and not-too-thin plastic. Simple Velcro strap keeps it all together, just throw in ball bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs Sylvan

customer_reviews.title: Just as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in an effort to mix-up my workouts and do some relay games. Granted, I could have used household items instead of paying for cones; however, they are cute, seem durable, and have served their purpose. They are lightweight but I'm only using them indoors and not outside. They serve my purpose. I like the half cone size as opposed to a full size cone since they don't take up a lot of storage space. They are just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Lady

customer_reviews.title: good, not too thin
customer_reviews.text: not too thin- heavy enough to hold up so far. the little children already lost the strap that came with it, but it does come with one. would be good for coaches or for practicing at home.
customer_reviews.author: M Howard

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for using at home!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for at-home soccer practice! The strap keeps them all stored together, and they are super durable.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Love the strap holder
customer_reviews.text: I’m a soccer coach for Pre-k through 2nd grade and these served their purpose. I love the Velcro strap holder that came with them as I carry a giant bag of balls and these were easy enough to throw in.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle H.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my church. These worked great for games. The little ones have stomped all over them and they’re still hanging strong. AND. They don’t take up much storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara - NYC

customer_reviews.title: works great with skates
customer_reviews.text: they get the job done for a good price, I use them to train agility drills on skates with my Roller Derby team, especially good for this as it isn't a big deal if you run one over it will sort of collapse and generally won't drop you on your butt.
customer_reviews.author: No Dice

customer_reviews.title: Good for pickup sports
customer_reviews.text: Great cones, just like the ones my soccer team used. These cones are a very bright orange and are heavy enough that I have had no issues with wind. They aren't super rigid but can can deflect a ball when hit unless it is quite direct (like bouncing on it) which may cause the code to deform. Naturally they can be bent very easily but I have not had any issues with them retaining odd shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! I use this to train my son in basketball! Wont trip on it.
customer_reviews.author: I. Baron

customer_reviews.title: I use these to mark where the cat puked
customer_reviews.text: I use these to mark where the cat puked. They're nice and low profile which is nice because no one wants to trip over cat puke markers.
customer_reviews.author: AberrantRambler

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that these are the most sturdy cones that I have seen but they are not not too flimsy and they are good enough. For the price, they are a terrific buy. I've only had the cones for a few weeks and they are perfect for my needs (additional soccer practice for my kids in the backyard). I can't really speak to how they will hold up over time. If you expect heavy use with a good deal of trampling, especially with older/heavier kids then you may need a thicker cone. Honestly though, I think you'll be fine with these and like I said earlier, they are a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BrianP

customer_reviews.title: Orange.  Plastic.  Cones.  Wow.
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm. . . Perfectly orange, plastic and, uh, coneular. Really, the markers are nothing special, just exactly what I expected at a reasonable price. Wish I could say that about every thing else I purchase. And when the kids leave them in the yard and the dogs chew on them, no big deal--hey, maybe if they were BPA free, I'd give 'em 6 stars.
customer_reviews.author: W. Overton

customer_reviews.title: Good for soccer
customer_reviews.text: Good for soccer. Good for football. Since this has a low profile, this is very durable and flexible so you can step on it as many times as you want and it'll still go back to its original posture. Bright color makes it visible from a good distance. Light and low profile make it easy to transfer around and store away.
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Thin plastic - warps a bit
customer_reviews.text: These cones do the job, but they are pretty thin plastic and warp a bit more than I thought they should. They came already warped and don't seem to go back in place. Still, they serve their purpose - I just would rather spend a few dollars more for ones that don't warp so much.
customer_reviews.author: Wuahahaha

customer_reviews.title: just don't leave them in the sun like my kids did
customer_reviews.text: They serve their purpose, just don't leave them in the sun like my kids did. They fade like crazy but they still work. They look like they might crack if we keep leaving them out but that's our fault! They are a bit flimsy and they blow away when the wind blows very hard but that's the nature of these things.
customer_reviews.author: RChambers

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: I thought they'll be smaller, but they'll do the job.
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviewsHelp

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expected (from what other reviews I had read prior to buying) work well, good amount. Great to have to practice!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Just want to give three stars. We have used almost a month and some of them have cracked already. What a bad quality!
customer_reviews.author: Musthave

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer or anything creative and active you can think of
customer_reviews.text: We chose these to host a soccer camp, and its windy here in Oklahoma. So they are perfect as they don't blow over. They are also great for games to t-up a small ball on for games like defend the castle, where the kids kick soccer balls at the cone/ball castle and I defend it as best as I can. They are bright cones, light, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Coy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for practice. Strap makes it easy to keep them organized and provides a convenient carrying option.
customer_reviews.author: Gibbs Family

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Nice, cheap, plastic cones. What can you expect for this price. I train little kids so they will step on it and it just bends and pops right back. Had some windy days and didn't have a problem with it blowing away as long as it is sitting right.
customer_reviews.author: Olga  S Kormuskina

customer_reviews.title: Durable cones for kids
customer_reviews.text: I use these cones indoors for my Taekwondo class and it's perfect for doing long jumps, in and outs, and making a circle track. They are very durable whether you step on it or bend it. I bought these back in 2013 and continue to use them today.
customer_reviews.author: JLY

customer_reviews.title: They’re perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Bright Hue! Great visibility! Great quality! Strap is handy! “Got a good weight to them” -Some Oldhead
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Cones
customer_reviews.text: These cones are decent for the price. There are better ones out there...but they also cost much more. My husband coaches my sons soccer team, and they use these cones and a set of the large heavy duty cones at practice. These cones work nicely for drills. The kids abuse them and so far, they have held up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help eliminate miscalls during my weekly scrimmage soccer games with my friends and they did just that. We use them to outline the pitch as there really aren’t any lines per say. Bad calls are gone and matches go smoothly. Their size, durability and color is perfect. Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bossa

customer_reviews.title: Effective for my small club team
customer_reviews.text: I run a Rugby team in nyc and use these cones to mark off territory in our very busy parks for practices. We often have to fight for territory with baseball teams, soccer teams, etc to get a little space to run drills. These cones do a fine job of being noticable and marking off space without being a tripping hazard. They're easy to place and stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Hulk hands

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for us
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for our purposes. They are pretty lightweight, but hey, they're pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Criticalmom

customer_reviews.title: Worked for Football Practice
customer_reviews.text: Used these for Flag Football coaching. They are very durable and I could easily take a sharpy to them to get my name on them. They have no problem getting stepped on and going back to form. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on them staying orange
customer_reviews.text: Loses its color in minimal usage outdoors. Now is mostly white. I used them maybe a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Simple, yet effective
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with my purchase so far. I bought this set of cones to play ultimate frisbee, and they work. They seem pretty durable, and always come back into shape after getting stepped on. I do wish that they came in a case or with a strap to keep them together, but it's not a deal breaker at this price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jairam

customer_reviews.title: Good Cones
customer_reviews.text: Great cones overall but you have to watch out during high winds, it'll blow them away.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great way to mark a field
customer_reviews.text: Great way to mark a field. These are durable and can be stepped out and will bounce back into shape. Wish I had a set of these 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: Great markers for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for conditioning drills to run during my cardio days at the park. They work great but I can see them being damaged later. The material is thin plastic and very easily bent so I wouldn't suggest using them for anything that would cause them regular stress.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Great but no original packaging.
customer_reviews.text: As far as quality, this is as expected but I ordered this as a gift for a child and was a little disappointed that this didn't come in original packaging similar to this:  It just came deflated in a clear bag.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: CONE MARKERS, BUY THESE - GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: My grandson likes these for training for football, he got 2 sets. We priced them at 2 different sporting goods large box stores and the price was 21.95 in one store and 19.95 in the other. I like the price and the quality is great for what they are supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: MANDY the dog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My great nephew loves them and has added them to his training routine
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Worked as planned
customer_reviews.text: Great price and a solid product. I'd buy again if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: JonH

customer_reviews.title: These are great and you get plenty
customer_reviews.text: These are great and you get plenty. We looked in a lot of stores and could not find a better price. They are pretty durable and we haven't broken one yet
customer_reviews.author: Joe Alviar

customer_reviews.title: Great for sports!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these cones for sports (my husband coaches soccer) and they have been great. They arrived quickly and are extremely useful. I would definitely purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: Traci T.

customer_reviews.title: Love these. We really have fun playing games with ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. We really have fun playing games with them in the winter when the dogs are bored with being snowed in during sub zero temps and wind chills. Even my old dogs have loved playing the games with these.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen J.

customer_reviews.title: Great cones, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the flat cones for soccer, you don't have to worry about them getting knocked over. The trouble is, in the store they are normally $1 each. This is a great price for 12 cones! I bought them and they are perfect. They look no different than the ones I got at the sporting good store for $1 each!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy82805

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than local stores
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help me coach a first grade basketball team (yes, it's as stressful as you think it is). The local stores had 4 of these the same price as these 12 but are exactly the same. Low profile so no one will trip, sturdy enough to now break when stepped on.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L

customer_reviews.title: A good value and recommended.
customer_reviews.text: A good value. Basic low laying cones. Using them for 7 on 7 practice. As described, decent quality and arrived on time. I'd recommend for any youth team. For high-school and above I'd recommend as a throw away, use and if they're broken replace cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: John Murrey

customer_reviews.title: Good price, but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these cones thinking that all disc cones were created equal. These are not the same quality as others I have bought. Although they are flexible and don't feel as though they will break easily, they feel very thin and lightweight compared to SKLZ or Nike cones. Not bad if price is your priority, but I'll be looking for something heavier duty next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Super good value
customer_reviews.text: You get so many for the price, the quality is great, the velcro holder is nice to put them back away after your drills.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great item and value
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Use these for dog training, football practice, and dirt-bike riding skills for my son. Great value and no issues with durability,
customer_reviews.author: Curtis P.

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I got these to mark my stakes for my temporary antenna guy lines to keep people from tripping on them. They nest together (as shown), are light weight, and easy to pack. Perfect for emergency amateur radio operations.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice markers
customer_reviews.text: I use them in the yard to set up a practice for the 10 year old. If you bring them in after every practice they seem to keep there color well. The sun will always bleach out color from plastic especially reds.
customer_reviews.author: Herb G.

customer_reviews.title: Durable cones, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good cones, been stepped on during soccer practice many times and still going strong
customer_reviews.author: N.P.

customer_reviews.title: As depicted
customer_reviews.text: Bit heavier than expected when I carried them all together. Cones are well made and offer good contrast on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Sporadic Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cones for coaches
customer_reviews.text: Great cones that come with a handy organizer to keep them together when not in use. This also doubles as a carrier. The cones are very good quality. Definitely can withstand the elements and players hitting them.
customer_reviews.author: Tylae Westervelt

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice durable cones. I'm sure through wear and tear these will get pretty torn up, but so far I like them and use them with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: John from Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for any soccer player, great for practicing, my son uses them all the time
customer_reviews.author: INA

customer_reviews.title: better put them away out of sun if you want them to stay a bright color
customer_reviews.text: I use the cones outdoors. they faded SUPER FAST but the good news was that I had used vinyl numbers so when I pulled them off I had light white cones with red/orange numbers. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Davidson Harpur

customer_reviews.title: great field markers
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with these over the cones because I feel these will last longer. I've been using these for a few months. I shared this with some other dads and we have a good sized collective now. They are bright color and easy for the kids to see.
customer_reviews.author: vegas_berto

customer_reviews.title: Great Set at a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my sons for some speed and agility training this summer. There really isn't much to them, I got what I needed at a very reasonable price and I have no doubt they will last well for as long as we need them.
customer_reviews.author: David Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comes with plenty (as least I think so)
customer_reviews.text: Solid, didn't expect much and they do what they do...stand there bright orange.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Asencion Musgrove

customer_reviews.title: I love using these for outdoor and indoor drills
customer_reviews.text: I love using these for outdoor and indoor drills. They work very well and take up no space in my training bag. Light, cheap, and plentiful. This is a good investment if you're looking to train and improve your overall cardio and endurance.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my kids soccer training. They are durable and are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Castro

customer_reviews.title: For the price, I'd recommend this
customer_reviews.text: These have come in handy a number of times and can be used for a number of sports related activities. I use them a lot for boundaries and also for practicing. For the price, I'd recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: DayumWright

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of cones
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these for training drills. Great amount of cones. Love how they are circular, they don't get knocked over from being tall cones
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Madden

customer_reviews.title: Good little product to use however the cones are very ...
customer_reviews.text: Good little product to use however the cones are very light so be careful when using them in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Truthbetold

customer_reviews.title: good price but not heavy enough
customer_reviews.text: These cones are cheap and fit easily in my car so that I can practice soccer with my daughter. However, they are pretty flimsy and even a mild wind can blow them away.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer drills/etc
customer_reviews.text: Great for soccer drills/etc. Please note these are pretty flimsy/lightweight, and if you leave them out in the weather/sun, they will turn white.
customer_reviews.author: Pete I.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sports Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cones. I use them for coaching basketball. I love the strap to keep them together.
customer_reviews.author: ArikB

customer_reviews.title: Well made, bright, and good value
customer_reviews.text: No issues with this product. They are lightweight and not overly sturdy, but seem to be good quality and certainly good enough to mark off a soccer field. Nice bright color and a good value at ~$6 for a dozen.
customer_reviews.author: Chancey Tilston

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality cones for teaching kids to play sports
customer_reviews.text: Its a simple small set of cones. I set these up to help my son learn how to dribble a soccer ball with more proficiency. So far he is no Pele but I have seen some slight improvement. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: SanClementeJedi

customer_reviews.title: great for flag football
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, great for flag football. Bright and easy to spot and the velcro holder is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves his field cone markers!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson now has his own soccer field marked off for his practice.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good solid cones and a needed addition instead of the big tall ones.
customer_reviews.author: kickchick

customer_reviews.title: They're Cones, They're Cool, and they're Orange
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they are cones. Yes, they sit on the ground and succeed very well at doing that. it's amazing. And they stand out nicely, with a low profile that is hard to knock over.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Simmons (Brusimm)

customer_reviews.title: Used to build cone towers
customer_reviews.text: These markers are used as spacers for my 2 year old grandson to make cone towers. He uses a cone, then a marker, then a cone and so on, to build a tower. Then he takes the soccer ball and aims for the tower to knock it over. This is teaching him to control where he kick the ball. He loves it and I love that he is learning while playing. A rising soccer star!!1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Great for volleyball practice! Awesome for agility work or as targets. I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: Sportzmaster87

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This item was inexpensive and perfect for my purposes as a basketball coach for use in ball-handling drills. I will also be able to use the the cones for drills when coaching football and baseball.
customer_reviews.author: M. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Faded quickly
customer_reviews.text: The cones looked great when they arrived but quickly faded and became pale yellow after exposure to the Sun. For equipment that is known to be used outdoors, I was expecting better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Kaki

customer_reviews.title: ... do what they're supposed to and the price is good.
customer_reviews.text: They do what they're supposed to and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Tea Kake

customer_reviews.title: I love having the velcro strap to carry and keep them ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I love having the velcro strap to carry and keep them all together.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for coaching and leading speed & agility drills. A good reference video for some cone drills -->
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with how these turned out
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with how these turned out. They are a good size and are very flexible. They are exactly what you want to kids who are rough on things.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Yep...flat cones. :)
customer_reviews.text: Cones. They are flat cones. Uh, they weren't broken when they arrived, and showed up on time. They came as advertised....cones.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality is pretty good but they did not come with a strap as pictured here.
customer_reviews.author: European Book Treasurer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my 10 year old to train for soccer ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 10 year old to train for soccer at home. She loves them and we've had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: HLTX

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: serves their purpose and you dont have to worry about tripping over them if you step on it it just collapses so no worries for a lawsuit lol
customer_reviews.author: R.thompson

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I use these cones for base practice for my tee ball league and they are quite durable. The 4 year old kids run all over them and they just pop back up. I use them for a variety of workouts also including hill climbs and they stay in place. Heavy enough to hold on to the grass even during moderate winds. Great pricing also.
customer_reviews.author: Power Em

customer_reviews.title: The cones easily highlight the location of the cables
customer_reviews.text: These half-cone markers are being used as a safety feature to mark microphone and amplifier cables running from an audio mixer from the middle of an audience for an outdoor concert. The cones easily highlight the location of the cables.
customer_reviews.author: Don Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Great to get my son out to do extra training ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Great to get my son out to do extra training drills for football!
customer_reviews.author: N. Lieu

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to set up as markers for practicing tight turns while riding my motorcycle. They work perfectly and are light weight and bright... they also survive when you run over them!! Hoping to not do that too much more! I like the carry/storage strap.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: My teenage son is pleased with these.
customer_reviews.text: My son, a teenager, has made no complaints about these. He uses them for fun soccer practice with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Leter Windstorm

customer_reviews.title: Simple and inexpensive markers
customer_reviews.text: The price point is right on. Bought these to mark out random races and yards games
customer_reviews.author: Lou H.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Cones are great and I like the strap they come with as well. Only thing that could be better is the strength of the Velcro on the strap as I've noticed it losing some of its strength with prolonged use.
customer_reviews.author: John McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Sole, cheap, and durable
customer_reviews.text: I use these to set up cyclocross drill courses, and they work great. Running over them occasionally does little harm, and their bright color makes them easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Gotsick

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the boys to getting some training for football
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the boys to getting some training for football. Color makes them very easy to see...and lightweight to pack with gear
customer_reviews.author: Jamie D.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for football (flag or tackle) They stay put even ...
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for football (flag or tackle) They stay put even in high winds and kids have a hard time kicking them, which helps with their longevity.
customer_reviews.author: kraut

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Cones are flat, easier to carry and doesn't blow away with the wind and my kid (4 years old) can't kick them over as easy when running drills
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jr

customer_reviews.title: They are not thick heavy plastic like some reviewers have commented but I find them a ...
customer_reviews.text: They are not thick heavy plastic like some reviewers have commented but I find them a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ríos

customer_reviews.title: All purpose cones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these cones to assist my son on sport drill and they are very durable. These cones have been stepped on with cleats, out in the weather (SoCal), and dragged around in a bag. They have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence B.

product_meta.title: Cintz 2" Soccer Training Field Boundary Cones- Multiple Colors
feature_bullets: Set of 20 cones with carry strap - Orange color
Comes with a velcro carry strap for easy handling
